scripts.webpack: yarn requirements && yarn generate-asset-manager-models && NODE_PATH=node_modules webpack --config $npm_package_config_source/webpack.config.js --env=prod
scripts.webpack-dev: yarn requirements && yarn generate-asset-manager-models && NODE_PATH=node_modules webpack --config $npm_package_config_source/webpack.config.js
scripts.webpack-watch: yarn requirements && yarn generate-asset-manager-models && NODE_PATH=node_modules webpack --progress --config $npm_package_config_source/webpack.config.js --watch
scripts.prettier: prettier --config $npm_package_config_source/.prettierrc.json --parser typescript --write "./{src,tests}/Akeneo/ReferenceEntity/**/*.ts"; prettier --config $npm_package_config_source/.prettierrc.json --parser typescript --write "./{src,tests}/Akeneo/AssetManager/**/*.ts"; prettier --config $npm_package_config_source/.prettierrc.json --parser typescript --write "./{src,tests}/Akeneo/ReferenceEntity/**/*.tsx"; prettier --config $npm_package_config_source/.prettierrc.json --parser typescript --write "./{src,tests}/Akeneo/AssetManager/**/*.tsx"; prettier --config $npm_package_config_source/.prettierrc.json --parser typescript --write "./tests/front/**/*.js";
scripts.before-commit: yarn prettier && yarn lint && yarn test
scripts.test: yarn unit && yarn webpack-test --env=prod && yarn integration && yarn acceptance-re && yarn acceptance-am && yarn acceptance tests/features && yarn acceptance $npm_package_config_source/tests/features
scripts.acceptance-report: NODE_PATH=./node_modules yarn run acceptance -- -f json:public/test_dist/acceptance-js.json && node $npm_package_config_source/frontend/test/acceptance/generate-html-report.js
